main

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Grid

  • public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
    The world in which toy proteins reside. The class provides an abstraction of integral coordinate system with unlimited range in all direction. The first monomer of a toy protein always resides at the origin of this system.

      • update

        public boolean update(Monomer monomer)
        Updatetes the matrix by linking the parameter monomer to the corresponding cell if it is empty. If the matrix is two small it is created again with larger size.
        Parameters:
        monomer -
        Returns:
        true upon success and false upon failur, that is in case the cell was already occupied.

      • countContacts

        public int countContacts(Monomer monomer)
        Counts the number of HH contacts between the
        Parameters:
        monomer - and its neighbors with higher spetial indeces. The other contacts will be taken care of by the other monomers.
        Returns:
        the number of contacts
